author: bryanche
msg: Add control-jar taskdef to beehive-tools.xml and remove it from all the
other control build files.  This will allow control developers to import
beehive-tools.xml rather than having to redefine this taskdef over and

msg: changed default temporary directory for build (MYFACES-245)

author: ekoneil
msg: Fixes for JIRA 734.  This puts the category list in the ServletContext.
Also includes a font fix for the copyright JSP tag file to make the copyright and Beehive fonts the same size.
